1370: Pauels moved to Die lange straet3.D.13 after marriage.
Got married to Reynwi at age 27 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Reynwi, Saswe, at age 27.
1371: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Hille, at age 28.
1372: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Emgelberna, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Reynwi, Sygerus, at age 30.
1374: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Geile, at age 31.
Lost son Sygerus when Sygerus was 2 years old.
1375: Had a son with Reynwi, Remdo, at age 32.
1381: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Flore, at age 38.
1384: Had a son with Reynwi, Hardenbernus, at age 41.
1386: Lost daughter Flore when Flore was 6 years old.
1387: Had a son with Reynwi, Eylwardo, at age 44.
1389: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Auesoete, at age 46.
